title: Regards d'artisans
description: Regards d'artisans invites you to slip into the skin of an apprentice craftsman. The experience takes you to the side of a craftsman, in the intimate setting of a workshop, place of sharing his know-how. You will be guided in your initiation to the profession by the voice of a passionate workshop master.
why: Built during a six month period at Gobelins, l'Ecole de l'Image, from conception to coding, with a team of 5 people:  1 other developer: Juliette Sage--Aubriot and 2 designers: Eloîse Luna, Vincent Calas and Chloélia Breton.
